HomePage.slogan: Stay on budget without the stress.

features.title: What You Can Do with Manejalo!

monthlyBudgets.title: Create Monthly Budgets
monthlyBudgets.description: Set limits for different spending categories every month.
monthlyBudgets.tooltip: Plan your month by assigning a maximum amount to each category, like food, transport, or entertainment.

visualizeSpending.title: Visualize Your Spending
visualizeSpending.description: Get clear charts and summaries to see where your money goes.
visualizeSpending.tooltip: Track spending trends with visual breakdowns to understand which areas consume most of your budget.

spendingHistory.title: Access Spending History
spendingHistory.description: View detailed records filtered by month and category.
spendingHistory.tooltip: Go back in time and review what you spent, when, and in which category — all neatly organized.

stayWithinLimits.title: Stay Within Your Limits
stayWithinLimits.description: Know instantly if you’re overspending or staying on track.
stayWithinLimits.tooltip: Get alerts or visual cues when you approach or exceed your planned budget for any category.

categorizeEverything.title: Categorize Everything
categorizeEverything.description: Organize your financial life with fully customizable categories.
categorizeEverything.tooltip: Create, edit, or delete categories to match how you manage your personal expenses — flexible and personal.

moreComingSoon.title: More Features Coming Soon!
moreComingSoon.description: We’re working on new features to enhance your experience.
moreComingSoon.tooltip: Expect frequent updates with tools to improve how you plan, spend, and save your money.
